ygData.subject: Re: This is what I have so far on jewelry
ygData.msgSnippet: I think you are all crazy and waistin good money ... I ll wait till i can get money rolling in fast before i do things like that. The Wanderer ... === The
ygData.messageBody:
I think you are all crazy and waistin good money
:-) just my opinion,
I'll wait till i can get money rolling in fast before
i do things like that.
The Wanderer

--- Mike Arnette <mike2@...> wrote:
> From: mike2@... (Mike Arnette)
>
> Haven't tried that yet, but silver does NOT combine
> with lightstones or
> greater lightstones.
>
> -Chantro of Rathe
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Ben Setala <onlyanembryo@...>
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
> Date: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 3:49 AM
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: This is what I have so
> far on jewelry
>
>
> >From: Ben Setala <onlyanembryo@...>
> >
> >
> >Has anyone tried using metals other than the bars,
> such as copper
> >amulets or silver studs and combined them with
> anything?
> >
> >Perhaps those things could be used as the third
> ingerdient.
> >
> >--- osmosis <osmosis@...> wrote:
> >> From: osmosis <osmosis@...>
> >>
> >>
> >> >recently I tried 3 ingredient experiments
> though, I
> >> used cheap gems so I
> >> >would not waste the money that I do not have :)
> >> >I tried Silver with cheap gems, with pixie dust
> (I
> >> have like 20 pixie dust
> >> >so I figured why not) I figured pixie dust would
> >> work, cause you can
> >> >probably mix the dust into the metal but it did
> not
> >> work :(
> >>
> >> I've got an idea, but it will take participation.
> >> Perhaps we can each try
> >> combinine 3 items one time, and this way we will
> get
> >> a wide spread of
> >> materials. Verant must have put 4 slots in the
> >> jewelers bag for some
> >> reason... weapons certainly dont fit in them so
> try
> >> anything... I have
> >> tried bone chips (dont combine), bat wings (dont
> >> combine), and multiple
> >> gems (never works). I dont see what combining
> gems
> >> or metal with pelts
> >> could do. I may try a rusted blackbox next...
> also
> >> I was wondering if
> >> there was any way of combining coins to perhaps
> make
> >> a bar of metal ,i.e. 4
> >> banks filled with 20 cp each may produce a copper
> >> bar? This doesnt really
> >> sound valid as that many sp=8gp when they can be
> >> purchased for 5, but could
> >> this be an untried idea? let me know!
> >>
> >> Cogg
> >>
> >>
> >>
>
